title: Other multiple injuries of abdomen, lower back and pelvis
chapter: Injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes
block: Injuries to the abdomen, lower back, lumbar spine and pelvis
category: Other and unspecified injuries of abdomen, lower back and pelvis
inclusion: Injuries classifiable to more than one of the categories S30-S39.6
exclusion: effects of foreign body in: anus and rectum
effects of foreign body in: genitourinary tract
effects of foreign body in: stomach, small intestine and colon
injuries in S36.- with injuries in S37.-
